TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DropShadowBitmapEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect
Public NotInheritable Class DropShadowBitmapEffect Inherits BitmapEffect

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**
非過時的替代方式是 。
在視覺物件後面略偏的位置套用陰影。

span.span: Applies a shadow behind a visual object at a slight offset.

summary.span: 位移由想像光源投射的陰影決定。

span.span: The offset is determined by mimicking a casting shadow from an imaginary light source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 已軟體呈現點陣圖效果。 bitmap effects are software rendered. 套用效果的任何物件也會在軟體中轉譯。Any object that applies an effect will also be rendered in software. 不應該將點陣圖效果套用至大型的視覺效果或動畫，因為這可能會降低效能。Bitmap effects should not be applied to large visuals or animations because this can degrade performance.

span.span: for creating an instance of the class.

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**
非過時的替代方式是 。
建立這個 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性將仍為 。

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

建立這個 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

summary.span: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

span.span: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性將仍為 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Color Color { System::Windows::Media::Color get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Color value); };

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**
非過時的替代方式是 。
取得或設定陰影的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of the shadow.

value.span: 陰影的色彩。
預設值是FF000000 （黑色）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks Alpha 值結構會忽略這個屬性。The alpha value of the structure is ignored by this property. 若要設定的色彩的透明度 (alpha)，使用屬性。To set the amount of transparency (alpha) of the color, use the property. 下圖示範這個屬性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較陰影顏色的屬性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowcolor.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較陰影顏色的屬性值")![Screenshot: Compare shadow color property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowcolor.png "Screenshot: Compare shadow color property values") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Direction { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**
非過時的替代方式是 。
取得或設定陰影投射的角度。

span.span: Gets or sets the angle at which the shadow is cast.

value.span: 陰影投射的角度。

span.span: The angle at which the shadow is cast.

value.span: 值的有效範圍為 0 到 360。

span.span: The valid range of values is from 0 through 360.

value.span: 值 0 的方向即為物體正右方。

span.span: The value 0 puts the direction immediately to the right of the object.

value.span: 後續的值則以逆時針方向繞著物體移動方向。

span.span: Subsequent values move the direction around the object in a counter-clockwise direction.

value.span: 例如，值 90 表示陰影投射在物體正上方；而值 180 投射在物體正左方，依此類推。

span.span: For example, a value of 90 indicates the shadow is cast directly upward from the object; a value of 180 is cast directly to the left of the object, and so on.

value.span: 預設值是 315。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示陰影投射的這個屬性指定值的方向。The following diagram shows in which direction the shadow is cast for a given value of this property. ![圖表： DropShadow 方向](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "圖表： DropShadow 方向")![Diagram: DropShadow direction](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "Diagram: DropShadow direction") 下圖示範這個屬性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較陰影方向](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較陰影方向")![Screenshot: Compare shadow direction](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection.png "Screenshot: Compare shadow direction") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Noise { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**
非過時的替代方式是 。
取得或設定陰影的顆粒粗細度或「雜訊等級」。

span.span: Gets or sets the graininess, or "noise level," of the shadow.

value.span: 陰影的雜訊等級。

span.span: The noise level of the shadow.

value.span: 值的有效範圍為 0 到 1。

span.span: The valid range of values is from 0 through 1.

value.span: 值為 0 表示沒有雜訊，1 則表示雜訊最大。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates no noise and 1 indicates maximum noise.

value.span: 值 0.5 表示 50% 的雜訊，值 0.75 表示 75% 的雜訊，依此類推。

span.span: A value of 0.5 indicates 50 percent noise, a value of 0.75 indicates 75 percent noise, and so on.

value.span: 預設值為 0。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖示範這個屬性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 Noise 屬性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadownoise.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 Noise 屬性值")![Screenshot: Compare Noise property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadownoise.png "Screenshot: Compare Noise property values") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**
非過時的替代方式是 。
取得或設定陰影的不透明度。

span.span: Gets or sets the degree of opacity of the shadow.

value.span: 不透明度。
值的有效範圍為 0 到 1。

span.span: The valid range of values is from 0 through 1.

value.span: 值為 0 表示陰影完全透明，而值為 1 表示陰影完全不透明。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates that the shadow is completely transparent, and a value of 1 indicates that the shadow is completely opaque.

value.span: 值為 0.5 表示陰影 50% 不透明，而值為 0.725 表示陰影 72.5% 不透明，依此類推。

span.span: A value of 0.5 indicates the shadow is 50 percent opaque, a value of 0.725 indicates the shadow is 72.5 percent opaque, and so on.

value.span: 小於 0 的值視為 0，而大於 1 的值則視為 1。

span.span: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.

value.span: 預設為 1。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須用來設定的不透明度因為 alpha 元件層級的屬性會被忽略。This property must be used to set the opacity of the because the alpha level component of the property is ignored. 下圖示範這個屬性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![包含圖說文字的螢幕擷取畫面： DropShadowBitmapEffect](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowopacity.png "圖說文字的螢幕擷取畫面： DropShadowBitmapEffect")![Screenshot with callouts: DropShadowBitmapEffect](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowopacity.png "Screenshot with callouts: DropShadowBitmapEffect") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ShadowDepth { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**
非過時的替代方式是 。
取得或設定物件和投射陰影之間的距離。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between the object and the shadow that it casts.

value.span: 投射陰影之物件的平面與陰影平面之間的距離，以[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 為單位。

span.span: The distance between the plane of the object casting the shadow and the shadow plane measured in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

value.span: 值的有效範圍為 0 到 300。

span.span: The valid range of values is from 0 through 300.

value.span: 預設值為 5。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖示範這個屬性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 ShadowDepth 屬性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowshadowdepth.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 ShadowDepth 屬性值")![Screenshot: Compare ShadowDepth property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowshadowdepth.png "Screenshot: Compare ShadowDepth property values") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Softness { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**
非過時的替代方式是 。
取得或設定陰影的濃淡。

span.span: Gets or sets the softness of the shadow.

value.span: 陰影濃淡。
值的有效範圍為 0 到 1。

span.span: The valid range of values is from 0 through 1.

value.span: 0.0 的值表示不柔和 (定義為較深的陰影)，而 1.0 表示最大柔和度 (非常模糊的陰影)。

span.span: A value of 0.0 indicates no softness (a sharply defined shadow) and 1.0 indicates maximum softness (a very diffused shadow).

value.span: 值 0.5 表示 50% 的柔和度，值 0.75 表示 75% 的柔和度，依此類推。

span.span: A value of 0.5 indicates 50 percent softness, a value of 0.75 indicates 75 percent softness, and so on.

value.span: 預設值為 0.5。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖示範這個屬性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 Softness 屬性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowsoftness.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 Softness 屬性值")![Screenshot: Compare Softness property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowsoftness.png "Screenshot: Compare Softness property values") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
